text: Last night couldn’t have really gone better. It was fun to present, I got a few laughs, and some high praise. A senior paint and roto artist from ILM really liked my reel and said it was just the sort of thing they look for from a candidate. I was the only 2D artist up there (and there were only 3 others out of about 60 people, surprisingly) and alongside some really nice 3D artists. Overall it was better than I could’ve thought and the only piece of feedback I really got was to apply for ILM’s graduate programme from ILM themselves. I feel really quite blown away.
That's awesome! Strike while the iron's hot and send in your application. Keep it up, looks like you're on a roll!

I would love to but unfortunately none of the graduate programs open up until March at the earliest. I will jump straight on every one I can for sure when they do. By that point I should have a stronger reel too! Thank you!
